org.openjdk.tools.javac.main

类 CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends Object
    Various utility methods for processing Java tool command line arguments.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 方法详细资料

      • parse

        public static String[] parse(String[] args)
                      throws IOException
        Process Win32-style command files for the specified command line arguments and return the resulting arguments. A command file argument is of the form '@file' where 'file' is the name of the file whose contents are to be parsed for additional arguments. The contents of the command file are parsed using StreamTokenizer and the original '@file' argument replaced with the resulting tokens. Recursive command files are not supported. The '@' character itself can be quoted with the sequence '@@'.
        参数:
        args - the arguments that may contain @files
        返回:
        the arguments, with @files expanded
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading any of the @files

      • parse

        public static List<String> parse(String envVariable,
                                 List<String> args)
                          throws IOException,
                                 CommandLine.UnmatchedQuote
        Process the given environment variable and appends any Win32-style command files for the specified command line arguments and return the resulting arguments. A command file argument is of the form '@file' where 'file' is the name of the file whose contents are to be parsed for additional arguments. The contents of the command file are parsed using StreamTokenizer and the original '@file' argument replaced with the resulting tokens. Recursive command files are not supported. The '@' character itself can be quoted with the sequence '@@'.
        参数:
        envVariable - the env variable to process
        args - the arguments that may contain @files
        返回:
        the arguments, with environment variable's content and expansion of @files
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading any of the @files
        com.sun.tools.javac.main.CommandLine.UnmatchedQuote
        CommandLine.UnmatchedQuote

      • parse

        public static String[] parse(String envVariable,
                             String[] args)
                      throws IOException,
                             CommandLine.UnmatchedQuote
        Process the given environment variable and appends any Win32-style command files for the specified command line arguments and return the resulting arguments. A command file argument is of the form '@file' where 'file' is the name of the file whose contents are to be parsed for additional arguments. The contents of the command file are parsed using StreamTokenizer and the original '@file' argument replaced with the resulting tokens. Recursive command files are not supported. The '@' character itself can be quoted with the sequence '@@'.
        参数:
        envVariable - the env variable to process
        args - the arguments that may contain @files
        返回:
        the arguments, with environment variable's content and expansion of @files
        抛出:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading any of the @files
